attributes.action: Delay the next school term by 2 months, so children get actual class time.
attributes.additional_details:
Rather than asking stressed parents to try and home school children for the next 3 months (albeit with virtual lessons), simply delay the start of the next term by 2 months.

That way at least the children would get some physical classroom time once they can return and us parents get a chance to rebuild our lives, employment, businesses etc. with the children back at school.
attributes.background: It's pretty obvious, by the time we're through this pandemic, it's going to be around July, just before the children are due to be off school for 5-7 weeks on summer holidays!
